headline.main: Bar Shooting Suspect Asked Victims if 'Status Was Legal'
headline.print_headline: Bar Shooting Suspect Asked Victims if 'Status Was Legal'

lead_paragraph: An Indian man wounded in an apparently racially motivated shooting that killed his friend at a suburban Kansas City bar told detectives that the gunman asked if their "status was legal" before he opened fire, according to an affidavit released Monday.
